plugins.name: plugins
plugins.title: Plugin APIs
plugins.description: Here you will find plugins maintained by the bit-docs organization.

contributing.name: contributing
contributing.title: Contributing
contributing.description: For general contributing guidelines, see the [Contributing Guide on DoneJS.com](https://donejs.com/contributing.html).

guides.name: guides
guides.title: Guides
guides.description: These guides are here to help you:

bit-docs-generate-html/generate.name: bit-docs-generate-html/generate
bit-docs-generate-html/generate.description:
Generates an HTML site for a [bit-docs/types/docMap]
given configuration siteConfig.

bit-docs-generate-html.name: bit-docs-generate-html
bit-docs-generate-html.description: Generates HTML for a docMap and handles the `html` hook.

bit-docs-generate-html/html.name: bit-docs-generate-html/html
bit-docs-generate-html/html.description:
A collection of helpers used to build and compile the templates used to
render each [bit-docs/types/docObject] into HTML and build the static JS and
CSS used by that HTML.

bit-docs-generate-readme.name: bit-docs-generate-readme
bit-docs-generate-readme.description: Generates a readme from other docs.

bit-docs-glob-finder.name: bit-docs-glob-finder
bit-docs-glob-finder.description: Finds files for passing to the bit-docs processor.

bit-docs-html-toc.name: bit-docs-html-toc
bit-docs-html-toc.description: Injects a table of contents for the page into an HTML element.

bit-docs-html-highlight-line.name: bit-docs-html-highlight-line
bit-docs-html-highlight-line.description: Adds a `@highlight` tag. Needs to be used after [bit-docs-prettify].

bit-docs-html-highlight-line/highlight-l.name: bit-docs-html-highlight-line/highlight-line.js
bit-docs-html-highlight-line/highlight-l.description: Main front end JavaScript file for static portion of this plugin.

bit-docs-html-toc/toc.js.name: bit-docs-html-toc/toc.js
bit-docs-html-toc/toc.js.description: Main front end JavaScript file for static portion of this plugin.

bit-docs-js.name: bit-docs-js
bit-docs-js.description: Tags, templates, and basic styles for JavaScript.

bit-docs-prettify.name: bit-docs-prettify
bit-docs-prettify.description: A bit-docs plugin that makes source-code snippets in HTML prettier.

bit-docs-prettify/prettify.js.name: bit-docs-prettify/prettify.js
bit-docs-prettify/prettify.js.description: Main front end JavaScript file for static portion of this plugin.

bit-docs-prettify/prettify.less.name: bit-docs-prettify/prettify.less
bit-docs-prettify/prettify.less.description: Layout of code wells and syntax highlighting of code languages.

bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustac.name: bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustache.isMustache
bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustac.title: isMustache
bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustac.description: Whether the filename has mustache or handlebars extension

bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustac.name: bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustache.getDocMapName
bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustac.title: getDocMapName
bit-docs-process-mustache/process-mustac.description: Returns the filename without the extension

bit-docs-tag-demo.name: bit-docs-tag-demo
bit-docs-tag-demo.description: Provides an `@demo` tag for embedding HTML, CSS, and JS in an iframe.

bit-docs-tag-package.name: bit-docs-tag-package
bit-docs-tag-package.description: Adds a `@package` tag for use in `bit-docs`.

bit-docs-tag-sourceref.name: bit-docs-tag-sourceref
bit-docs-tag-sourceref.description: Adds a `@sourceref` tag for use in `bit-docs`.

bit-docs-type-annotate.name: bit-docs-type-annotate
bit-docs-type-annotate.description: Utilities for parsing closure type annotations.

BitDocs.name: BitDocs
BitDocs.title: BitDocs
BitDocs.description: An evolving set of tools for the generation of documentation websites.

bit-docs.name: bit-docs
bit-docs.description: Find files, process them, and produce some sort of output.

bit-docs-dev/tags/group.name: bit-docs-dev/tags/group
bit-docs-dev/tags/group.title: @group
bit-docs-dev/tags/group.description: Declares that other tags belong to a group within the current `docObject`.

bit-docs-dev/tags/inherits.name: bit-docs-dev/tags/inherits
bit-docs-dev/tags/inherits.title: @inherits
bit-docs-dev/tags/inherits.description:
Indicates that the current [bit-docs/types/docObject] inherits from another
[bit-docs/types/docObject].

bit-docs-dev/tags/iframe.name: bit-docs-dev/tags/iframe
bit-docs-dev/tags/iframe.title: @iframe
bit-docs-dev/tags/iframe.description:
Adds an iframe to the page. It can be added to the 
[bit-docs-process-tags/tags/body @body] or any other tags that accept a
description.

bit-docs-dev/tags/page.name: bit-docs-dev/tags/page
bit-docs-dev/tags/page.title: @page
bit-docs-dev/tags/page.description:
Declares this comment as a page. Use pages to represent content that doesn't
belong to part of the application structure.

bit-docs-dev/tags/plugin.name: bit-docs-dev/tags/plugin
bit-docs-dev/tags/plugin.title: @plugin
bit-docs-dev/tags/plugin.description:
Specifies the parent [bit-docs/types/docObject]'s name. The current
docObject will be displayed under the the parent in the navigation.

bit-docs-dev/tags/release.name: bit-docs-dev/tags/release
bit-docs-dev/tags/release.title: @release
bit-docs-dev/tags/release.description:
Specifies the release of a [bit-docs-js/tags/param @param],
[bit-docs-js/tags/signature @signature],
[bit-docs-js/tags/function @function] or
[bit-docs-js/tags/property @property].

bit-docs-generate-html/build/build_hash.name: bit-docs-generate-html/build/build_hash
bit-docs-generate-html/build/build_hash.description: Returns a unique hash for the options that control the build.

bit-docs-generate-html/build/build.name: bit-docs-generate-html/build/build
bit-docs-generate-html/build/build.description:
A collection of helpers used to build and compile the templates used to
render each [bit-docs/types/docObject] into HTML and build the static JS and
CSS used by that HTML.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifEqual
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifAny
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifNotEqual
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.makeTitle
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Given the docObject context, returns a "pretty" name that is used
in the sidebar and the page header.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifGroup
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Renders the section if the current context is a group type like
"group", "prototype", or "static".

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.makeParamsString
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Given the parameters of a function valueData object, create a string that
represents the arguments.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.makeType
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Given an invidual type object, create something that represents it.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.makeTypesString
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Converts an array of [documentjs.process.typeData typeData]
to a readable string surrounded by {}.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.urlTest
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Returns the url for the docObject's test

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.getTypesWithDescriptions
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.getActiveAndParents
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Renders its sub-section with a `parents` array of docObjects and the
last parent menu as the "active" item.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.eachFirstLevelChildren
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Goes through the parent object's children.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.eachOrderedChildren
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Goes through each `children` in the sorted order.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifActive
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Renders the truthy section if the current item's name matches
the current docObject being rendered

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifHasActive
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Renders the truthy section if the current docObject being
rendered has a parent that is the current context.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifHasOrIsActive
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Renders the truthy section if the current docObject being
rendered has a parent that is the current context or is the
current context.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.ifFirstLevelChild
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description:
Renders the truthy section if the current context is a first level
child of the parent object.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.chain
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Chains multiple calls to mustache.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.makeSignature
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Makes the signature title html for a [documentjs.tags.signature @signature].

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.makeParentTitle
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Returns the parent docObject's title.

bit-docs-generate-html/build/helpers.name: bit-docs-generate-html/build/helpers
bit-docs-generate-html/build/helpers.description:
Gets the default helpers, and helpers in the _{buildHash}/site/templates_
folder, and registers them with Handlebars.

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: undefined

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.makeLinks
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Looks for links like [].

documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.name: documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelpers.urlTo
documentjs.generators.html.defaultHelper.description: Returns a url that links to a docObject's name.

bit-docs-generate-html/build/renderer.name: bit-docs-generate-html/build/renderer
bit-docs-generate-html/build/renderer.description: Creates a renderer function used to generate the documentation.

bit-docs-generate-html/build/templates.name: bit-docs-generate-html/build/templates
bit-docs-generate-html/build/templates.description: Creates a folder with all the templates used to generate the documentation.

bit-docs-generate-html/build/static_dist.name: bit-docs-generate-html/build/static_dist
bit-docs-generate-html/build/static_dist.description:
Builds a static distributable which will eventually be copied to the
`static` folder of the generated output.

bit-docs-generate-html/types/renderer.name: bit-docs-generate-html/types/renderer
bit-docs-generate-html/types/renderer.title: renderer
bit-docs-generate-html/types/renderer.description:
A renderer built by [bit-docs-generate-html/build/renderer] that is used to
render each [bit-docs/types/docObject].

bit-docs-generate-html/types/builder.name: bit-docs-generate-html/types/builder
bit-docs-generate-html/types/builder.title: builder
bit-docs-generate-html/types/builder.description:
A function that builds the static resources and copies the ones needed for
the html site to a distributable location.

bit-docs-generate-html/write/static_dist.name: bit-docs-generate-html/write/static_dist
bit-docs-generate-html/write/static_dist.description:
Copies the [bit-docs-generate-html/build/static_dist built distributable]
to a _static_ folder in `options.dest`.

bit-docs-generate-html/write/search_map.name: bit-docs-generate-html/write/search_map
bit-docs-generate-html/write/search_map.description: Writes out a simplified [bit-docs/types/docMap] to be used for searching.

bit-docs-generate-html/write/write.name: bit-docs-generate-html/write/write
bit-docs-generate-html/write/write.description:
A collection of helpers used to write out [bit-docs/types/docObject] and
[bit-docs/types/docMap]s using the structures produced by
[bit-docs-generate-html/build/build].

bit-docs-glob-finder/types/globObject.name: bit-docs-glob-finder/types/globObject
bit-docs-glob-finder/types/globObject.title: GlobObject
bit-docs-glob-finder/types/globObject.description:
An options object that configures the behavior of
[bit-docs-glob-finder/index]. It supports all of the options object of
[node-glob](https://github.com/isaacs/node-glob) plus a pattern option that
is used as `node-glob`'s first argument. Only the most commonly used options
are specified below:

bit-docs-js/process/code.name: bit-docs-js/process/code
bit-docs-js/process/code.title: code
bit-docs-js/process/code.description: Process a code hint into properties on a `docObject`.

bit-docs-js/tags/codeend.name: bit-docs-js/tags/codeend
bit-docs-js/tags/codeend.title: @codeend

bit-docs-js/tags/function.name: bit-docs-js/tags/function
bit-docs-js/tags/function.title: @function
bit-docs-js/tags/function.description: Specifies the comment block is for a function. Use  [bit-docs-js/tags/param] to specify the parameters of a function.

bit-docs-js/tags/option.name: bit-docs-js/tags/option
bit-docs-js/tags/option.title: @option
bit-docs-js/tags/option.description:
Describes a property of the object, or an argument of the function, that was
specified in an [bit-docs-js/tags/param] tag.

bit-docs-js/tags/prototype.name: bit-docs-js/tags/prototype
bit-docs-js/tags/prototype.title: @prototype
bit-docs-js/tags/prototype.description:
Declares that [bit-docs-js/tags/property] and [bit-docs-js/tags/function]
tags belong to the preceeding [bit-docs-js/tags/function]'s prototype
object.

bit-docs-js/tags/property.name: bit-docs-js/tags/property
bit-docs-js/tags/property.title: @property
bit-docs-js/tags/property.description: Documents a property of a parent object.

bit-docs-js/tags/signature.name: bit-docs-js/tags/signature
bit-docs-js/tags/signature.title: @signature
bit-docs-js/tags/signature.description:
Specifies a signature for a [bit-docs-js/tags/function @function] but can
work with any other tag.

bit-docs-js/tags/static.name: bit-docs-js/tags/static
bit-docs-js/tags/static.title: @static
bit-docs-js/tags/static.description:
Declares that [bit-docs-js/tags/property @property] and
[bit-docs-js/tags/function @function] tags belong to the preceeding
[bit-docs-js/tags/function @constructor].

bit-docs-js/tags/typedef.name: bit-docs-js/tags/typedef
bit-docs-js/tags/typedef.title: @typedef
bit-docs-js/tags/typedef.description:
Declares an alias for a more complex type. That alias can be used in
[bit-docs-type-annotate/types/typeExpression TYPE] declarations.

bit-docs-js/tags/module.name: bit-docs-js/tags/module
bit-docs-js/tags/module.title: @module
bit-docs-js/tags/module.description: Declares the export value for a module.

bit-docs-process-tags/tags/_default.name: bit-docs-process-tags/tags/_default
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/_default.title: @_default
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/_default.description:
The default tag behavior when `@TAG` begins a line, but no tag is defined
for `TAG`.

bit-docs-process-tags/tags/add.name: bit-docs-process-tags/tags/add
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/add.title: @add
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/add.description: Sets a [bit-docs/types/docObject] as the current scope.

bit-docs-process-tags/tags/body.name: bit-docs-process-tags/tags/body
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/body.title: @body
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/body.description: Markdown content placed after all signature and API content.

bit-docs-process-tags/tags/hide.name: bit-docs-process-tags/tags/hide
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/hide.title: @hide
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/hide.description: Hides the comment from the navigation.

bit-docs-process-tags/tags/description.name: bit-docs-process-tags/tags/description
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/description.title: @description
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/description.description: Markdown content placed before all signature and API content.

bit-docs-process-tags/tags/parent.name: bit-docs-process-tags/tags/parent
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/parent.title: @parent
bit-docs-process-tags/tags/parent.description:
Specifies the parent [bit-docs/types/docObject]'s name. The current
docObject will be displayed under the the parent in the navigation.

bit-docs-type-annotate/types/nameExpress.name: bit-docs-type-annotate/types/nameExpression
bit-docs-type-annotate/types/nameExpress.title: NAME-EXPRESSION
bit-docs-type-annotate/types/nameExpress.description:
Adds the `name` and other properties to
[bit-docs-type-annotate/types/valueData valueData] in using the
[bit-docs-js/tags/param @param] or [bit-docs-js/tags/param @option] tags.

module.exports.name: module.exports
module.exports.description: This is used to parse out content like `{TYPE} name() description`.

bit-docs-type-annotate/types/valueData.name: bit-docs-type-annotate/types/valueData
bit-docs-type-annotate/types/valueData.title: valueData
bit-docs-type-annotate/types/valueData.description:
Data related to a value in a [bit-docs-type-annotate/types/typeExpression
type expression].

bit-docs-type-annotate/types/typeData.name: bit-docs-type-annotate/types/typeData
bit-docs-type-annotate/types/typeData.title: typeData
bit-docs-type-annotate/types/typeData.description:
Data related to a specific type value. These objects are created by
[bit-docs-type-annotate/types/typeExpression type expressions].

DocumentJS.apis.generate.documentjs.name: DocumentJS.apis.generate.documentjs
DocumentJS.apis.generate.documentjs.title: documentjs
DocumentJS.apis.generate.documentjs.description: Generates documentation on the command line.

DocumentJS.guides.contributing.name: DocumentJS.guides.contributing
DocumentJS.guides.contributing.title: contributing
DocumentJS.guides.contributing.description: Learn how to contribute to DocumentJS.

DocumentJS.guides.configuring.name: DocumentJS.guides.configuring
DocumentJS.guides.configuring.title: configuring
DocumentJS.guides.configuring.description: Learn how to configure the `documentjs.json` file for your project.

DocumentJS.guides.customizing.name: DocumentJS.guides.customizing
DocumentJS.guides.customizing.title: customizing
DocumentJS.guides.customizing.description: Learn how to change the appearance and JavaScript behavior of your generated html documentation.

DocumentJS.guides.documenting.name: DocumentJS.guides.documenting
DocumentJS.guides.documenting.title: documenting
DocumentJS.guides.documenting.description: Learn how to document your code.

DocumentJS.guides.generating.name: DocumentJS.guides.generating
DocumentJS.guides.generating.title: generating
DocumentJS.guides.generating.description: Learn how to generate your documentation.

bit-docs/lib/process/file.name: bit-docs/lib/process/file
bit-docs/lib/process/file.description:
Processes a file's source. Adds created [bit-docs/types/docObject]s to
docMap.

bit-docs/lib/process/process.name: bit-docs/lib/process/process
bit-docs/lib/process/process.description: Processes a [bit-docs/types/FileEventEmitter] and returns a promise.

bit-docs-generate-html/about.name: bit-docs-generate-html/about
bit-docs-generate-html/about.title: About
bit-docs-generate-html/about.description: Templates and styles come with the default theme.

bit-docs/types/docMap.name: bit-docs/types/docMap
bit-docs/types/docMap.title: DocMap
bit-docs/types/docMap.description:
An object that contains every [bit-docs/types/docObject] keyed by the
docObject's name.

bit-docs/types/docObject.name: bit-docs/types/docObject
bit-docs/types/docObject.title: DocObject
bit-docs/types/docObject.description:
An object that represents something that is documented. Any property added to
a docObject is available to the templates and the client. The following lists
the important, near universal properties:

DocumentJS.projectConfig.name: DocumentJS.projectConfig
DocumentJS.projectConfig.title: projectConfig
DocumentJS.projectConfig.description: The configuration options for a project to retrieve and document.

bit-docs/types/generator.name: bit-docs/types/generator
bit-docs/types/generator.title: Generator
bit-docs/types/generator.description:
A generator module should produce a function that takes the following shape.
Generator modules are used to produce some form of documentation output.
[bit-docs-generate-html] is the default and currently only generator
packaged with bit-docs.

bit-docs/types/FileEventEmitter.name: bit-docs/types/FileEventEmitter
bit-docs/types/FileEventEmitter.title: FileEventEmitter
bit-docs/types/FileEventEmitter.description:
A [node event emitter](https://nodejs.org/api/events.html#events_class_eventemitter)
that produces events that correlate to files that should be processed.

DocumentJS.docConfig.name: DocumentJS.docConfig
DocumentJS.docConfig.title: docConfig
DocumentJS.docConfig.description:
Configures the behavior of DocumentJS.  The following are values found within
a _documentjs.json_ or the [DocumentJS.apis.generate.grunt] configuration.

DocumentJS.siteConfig.name: DocumentJS.siteConfig
DocumentJS.siteConfig.title: siteConfig
DocumentJS.siteConfig.description: The configuration options within a [DocumentJS.docConfig]'s `sites` objects or `sitesDefaults` object.

bit-docs/types/processOptions.name: bit-docs/types/processOptions
bit-docs/types/processOptions.title: ProcessOptions
bit-docs/types/processOptions.description:
An options object passed to several process methods, such as:
- [bit-docs-js/process/code]
- [bit-docs-js/process/codeAndComment]
- [bit-docs-process-tags/process-tags]

documentjs.Tag.name: documentjs.Tag
documentjs.Tag.title: Tag
documentjs.Tag.description:
The interface that [documentjs.tags] implement for
[documentjs.process.comment] and [documentjs.process.code] to call. This is
very likely to change to something better.

publishing.name: publishing
publishing.title: Publishing Your Style Guide
publishing.description: Once you've created the Live Style Guide, you may want to be able to publish it to share it with stakeholders.

multi.installing.name: multi.installing
multi.installing.title: Installing
multi.installing.description: Some instructions on installing the multi-page.

multi/lib/graph.graphData.name: multi/lib/graph.graphData
multi/lib/graph.graphData.title: graphData
multi/lib/graph.graphData.description: Data passed to the [multi/lib/graph] constructor function.

multi/util/date-helpers.name: multi/util/date-helpers
multi/util/date-helpers.description: Provides an object of date helpers.

multi/util/date-helpers.tomorrow.name: multi/util/date-helpers.tomorrow
multi/util/date-helpers.tomorrow.description: Provides the start time of tomorrow.

multi/util/date-helpers.yesterday.name: multi/util/date-helpers.yesterday
multi/util/date-helpers.yesterday.description: Provides the start time of yesterday.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/static.js
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: default/static/static.js
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Contains all the static assets like LESS and images.

lsg-adding-disclaimer.name: lsg-adding-disclaimer
lsg-adding-disclaimer.title: A Brief Disclaimer
lsg-adding-disclaimer.description: The [Standalone Guide](/docs/lsg-quickstart.html) is likely more precise when it comes to step-by-step instructions. Unfortunately, since we don't know exactly how your project looks we'll be making a number of assumptions for this guide:

lsg-adding-file-organization.name: lsg-adding-file-organization
lsg-adding-file-organization.title: File Organization
lsg-adding-file-organization.description: You'll write most of your documentation inline in your `css` or `less` files. You should add one file, `styleguide.md`, to your `styles` folder to write your landing page (and set up navigation).

lsg-adding-designers.name: lsg-adding-designers
lsg-adding-designers.title: DocumentJS for Designers
lsg-adding-designers.description: If you're working on a project that is already using DocumentJS, it is being used to generate JavaScript API docs. Since it's already being used, with only a little configuration you should be able to:

lsg-adding-next-steps.name: lsg-adding-next-steps
lsg-adding-next-steps.title: Writing and Customizing
lsg-adding-next-steps.description: Now that you've finished with installation and configuration, the rest of the the process (creating pages, documenting, and customizing your site) will follow the same steps as the [Standalone Style Guide](/docs/lsg-quickstart.html):

lsg-custom-styles.name: lsg-custom-styles
lsg-custom-styles.title: Look and Feel
lsg-custom-styles.description: The default look and feel of your Live Style Guide is going to be similar to DocumentJS.com as it is using the default theme.

lsg-quickstart-demos.name: lsg-quickstart-demos
lsg-quickstart-demos.title: Live Demos
lsg-quickstart-demos.description: The last thing you'll need in your Live Style Guide is the Live Demos. There are two more tags you'll use for this:

lsg-quickstart-file-organization.name: lsg-quickstart-file-organization
lsg-quickstart-file-organization.title: File Organization
lsg-quickstart-file-organization.description: You'll write most of your documentation inline in your `css` or `less` files. You should add one file, `styleguide.md`, to your `styles` folder to write your landing page (and set up navigation).

lsg-quickstart-designers.name: lsg-quickstart-designers
lsg-quickstart-designers.title: DocumentJS for Designers
lsg-quickstart-designers.description: Though you're documenting your styles, the tool you'll be using is DocumentJS. As long as your project is using [npm](http://npmjs.org), you will be able to:

lsg-quickstart-generate.name: lsg-quickstart-generate
lsg-quickstart-generate.title: Generating the Site
lsg-quickstart-generate.description: Now that you have your first page, you can generate the site for the first time. Open up a terminal in your project's directory and run:

lsg-quickstart-stylesheet.name: lsg-quickstart-stylesheet
lsg-quickstart-stylesheet.title: Documenting a Stylesheet
lsg-quickstart-stylesheet.description: *The next few pages will be very information-dense. If you're the kind of person who takes breaks, now would be a good time a good time.*

lsg-quickstart-organizing.name: lsg-quickstart-organizing
lsg-quickstart-organizing.title: Organizing your Style Guide
lsg-quickstart-organizing.description: After you've documented your first stylesheet, if you [generate the site](/docs/lsg-quickstart-generate.html) you won't see your stylesheet page anywhere in the sidebar. Even though the page has been generated, it isn't linked up to the rest of the site because you need to tell DocumentJS where to put it.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.helper-flex
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: #helper.flex
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Sets flexbox "grow" and "shrink" in most compatible way.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.helper-property-names
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: #helper.property-names
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Helper for setting multiple dash properties to same value.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.display-flex
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: .display-flex
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Sets the display to flex using vendor prefixes.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.flex-row
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: .flex-row
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Sets the display to flex and direction to row using vendor prefixes.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.flex-column
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: .flex-column
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Sets the display to flex and direction to column using vendor prefixes.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.flex-initial
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: .flex-initial
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Emulates `flex: initial;` in a compatible way using vendor prefixes.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.flex-auto
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: .flex-auto
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Emulates `flex: auto;` in a compatible way using vendor prefixes.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/mixins.less.flex-none
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.title: .flex-none
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Emulates `flex: none;` in a compatible way using vendor prefixes.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/styles.less
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: The primary styles for the default theme.

bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.name: bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/static/styles/variables.less
bit-docs-generate-html/site/default/stat.description: Variables to hold site-wide visual configurations.

night.name: night
night.description: Variables used to define the site's color palette.
